cookies.description: Manage cookies for bot detection bypass
cookies.usage: {prefix}cookies <add | remove | list | view | reset | use> [number | all]
cookies.invalidNumber: Please provide a valid cookie number (starting from 1).
cookies.noAttachment: Please attach a cookies.txt file to your message.
cookies.invalidCookiesFile: The file doesn't appear to be a valid cookies file.
cookies.addSuccess: {cookie} has been added successfully! It will take effect immediately.
cookies.addFailed: Failed to add the cookie file.
cookies.noRemoveTarget: Please specify which cookie to remove (number or 'all').
cookies.invalidRemoveTarget: Please provide a valid cookie number or 'all'.
cookies.noCookies: No cookies have been added yet. Use {usage} with a cookies.txt attachment.
cookies.allCookiesFailed: All cookies have failed! Please add new cookies or use {resetCmd} to retry.
cookies.resetSuccess: Cookie failed status has been reset. All cookies will be retried.
cookies.replaceSuccess: {cookie} has been replaced successfully! It will take effect immediately.
cookies.slashUseDescription: Manually switch to a specific cookie
cookies.useSuccess: Successfully switched to {cookie}. It will be used for the next request.
cookies.useFailed: {cookie} is currently marked as failed. Use `cookies reset` first to retry failed cookies.

help.description: Shows the command list or information for a specific command
help.footerString: {prefix}help <command> to get more information on a specific command
help.noCommanSuggest: Couldn't find matching command name. Did you mean this?
help.noCommand: Couldn't find any matching command name.
help.slashDescription: Command name to view specific information about the command

invite.clickURL: **[Click here]({url})** to invite this bot to your server.
invite.description: Get the invite link for the bot

ping.description: Shows the current ping of the bot

language.description: Change the bot's language for this server
language.noPermission: You need the **Manage Server** permission to use this command.
language.languageSet: Server language has been set to
language.languageReset: Server language has been reset to default:

dj.noPermission: You don't have the **Manage Server** permission to use this command.

role.noRole: DJ role hasn't been set, please set it with `{prefix}dj role`
role.success: DJ role has been set to <@&{role}>

dj.slashRoleDescription: View or change the DJ role

filter.filterRestartedFooter: Song restarted from beginning (audio was still buffering).
filter.filterNoQueueFooter: The filter will apply when you start playing music.
filter.slashStateDescription: {state, select, enable {Enable} other {Disable}} a song filter
filter.slashStateFilterDescription: The song filter that will be {state, select, enable {enabled} other {disabled}}
filter.slashStatusDescription: Check the current status of song filters
filter.slashStatusFilterDescription: The song filter that you want to check

lyrics.apiError: The API could not find the song {song}, because: {message}
lyrics.description: Show the lyrics from the song
lyrics.noQuery: There is nothing playing, or no arguments are provided.

nowplaying.disableButton: Previous buttons are no longer active and removed.

pause.alreadyPause: The music player is already paused.
pause.pauseMessage: The music player has been paused.

play.alreadyPlaying: The music player is already playing to {voiceChannel} voice channel.
play.noSongData: That URL doesn't have any song data.

remove.noPermission: You don't have permission to use this command.
remove.noPositions: Please specify the song positions to remove.
remove.slashPositionsDescription: Position of the songs to remove separated by comma or space
remove.songSkip: The current song was removed, song skipped.
remove.songsRemoved: Removed {removed, plural, one {1 song} other {# songs}} from the queue

repeat.description: Repeat current music or the queue
repeat.newMode: The repeat mode has been set to {mode}

resume.alreadyResume: The music player is not paused.
resume.resumeMessage: The music player has been resumed.

search.cancelMessage: Type {cancel} or c to cancel music selection.
search.description: Play some music using the provided query
search.noQuery: Please provide some query to search.
search.noSelection: No or invalid value entered, music selection canceled.
search.noTracks: I can't obtain any search results.
search.queueEmbed: Please select some music; you can choose more than one using blank space or {separator}.
search.slashSourceDescription: Where the music should be taken?

shuffle.newState: Shuffle mode is now set to {state}

seek.description: Seek to a specific time in the current song
seek.exceedsDuration: The seek time exceeds the song duration ({duration}).
seek.invalidTime: Invalid time format: {time}. Use formats like `1:30` or `90`.
seek.noTime: Please specify a time to seek to.
seek.notCached: Cannot seek in this song yet. Please wait for the audio to buffer.
seek.waitingForCache: Please wait, the audio is still buffering...

skip.voteResultMessage: {length}/{required} voted to skip the current song

skipTo.cantPlay: You can't skip to current music.
skipTo.description: Skip to a specific position in the queue
skipTo.noPermission: You don't have permission to use this command.
skipTo.noSongPosition: Unable to find a song in that position.
skipTo.slashFirstDescription: Rewind to the first song in the queue
skipTo.slashLastDescription: Skip to the last song in the queue
skipTo.slashSpecificDescription: Skip to a specific position in the queue

stop.stoppedMessage: The music player has been stopped.

volume.changeVolume: To change the volume, provide the volume number when using this command.
volume.plsPause: Please pause the music instead of setting the volume to {volume}
volume.volumeLimit: I can't set the volume above {maxVol}

requestChannel.description: Set up a request channel for music
requestChannel.noPermission: You need the **Manage Server** permission to use this command.
requestChannel.invalidChannel: Please provide a valid text channel.
requestChannel.noBotPermissions: I couldn't check my permissions for that channel.
requestChannel.missingBotPermissions: I'm missing the following permissions in that channel: {permissions}
requestChannel.failedToSetup: Failed to set up the request channel. Please check my permissions.
requestChannel.alreadyHasChannel: This server already has a request channel set to {channel}. Please remove it first before setting a new one.
requestChannel.channelAlreadyInUse: This channel is already being used as a request channel.
requestChannel.slashSetDescription: Set a channel as the request channel
requestChannel.slashChannelDescription: The channel to set as request channel

channelUpdate.reconfigureConnection: Voice channel region changed, re-configuring connection...
channelUpdate.unableReconfigureConnection: Unable to re-configure connection, the queue has been deleted.

createInteraction.message1: Sorry, but that interaction is only for <@{user}> and the server staff.
createInteraction.message2: Sorry, but that interaction is only for <@{user}>

voiceStateUpdate.deleteQueue: {duration} has been passed and there's no one who joined the voice channel, the queue has been deleted.
voiceStateUpdate.disconnectFromVCMessage: Disconnected from the voice channel, the queue has been deleted.
voiceStateUpdate.joinStageMessage: Successfully joined the stage channel as Speaker.
voiceStateUpdate.joiningAsSpeaker: Moved to the stage channel, trying to join as Speaker...
voiceStateUpdate.pauseQueue:
Everyone has left the voice channel. To save resources, the queue has been paused.
If no one joins the voice channel in the next {duration}, the queue will be deleted.
voiceStateUpdate.reconfigureConnection: Moved to a voice channel with a different region, re-configuring connection...
voiceStateUpdate.resumeQueue:
Someone has joined the voice channel.
Resuming {song}
voiceStateUpdate.unableJoinStageMessage: Unable to join as Speaker, the queue has been deleted.
voiceStateUpdate.unableReconfigureConnection: Unable to re-configure connection, the queue has been deleted.

requestChannel.title: Music Player
requestChannel.standby: No music playing. Send a song name or URL to start playing!
requestChannel.queueFooter: â€¢ Total remaining tracks in queue: {count} ({duration} of duration)
requestChannel.notInVoice: You need to be in a voice channel to request music.
requestChannel.noResults: No results found for your query.
requestChannel.addedPlaylistToQueue: Added {count} songs from {playlist} to the queue.
requestChannel.removed: Removed {song} from the queue and skipped.
requestChannel.stopped: Stopped the music and cleared the queue.
requestChannel.setChannel: Request channel has been set to {channel}.
requestChannel.noChannel: No request channel is currently set.
requestChannel.skipInProgress: Please wait, a skip operation is already in progress.
requestChannel.noPermission: You don't have permission to perform this action. Only DJ role, server managers, or the song requester can do this.

reusable.invalidUsage: Invalid usage, please use {prefix} {name} for more information.

commonUtil.botMissingChannelPerms: I'm missing the following permissions in {channel}: {permissions}

generalHandler.errorJoining: Error while joining the voice channel, because: {message}
generalHandler.errorPlaying: An error occurred while trying to play music, because: {message}
generalHandler.leftVC: Left from the voice channel because I've been inactive for too long.
generalHandler.queueEnded: Queue has ended, use {usage} to play more music.
generalHandler.songRequeued: Had trouble playing {song}, re-queued for another attempt.
generalHandler.allCookiesFailed: All cookies have failed due to bot detection! Please add new cookies using `{prefix}cookies add <number>` command with a cookies.txt attachment, or use `{prefix}cookies reset` to retry existing cookies.

musicDecorator.noInVC: Sorry, but you need to be in a voice channel to do that.
musicDecorator.notPlaying: There is no music currently playing. Please play a song first.
musicDecorator.sameVC: You need to be in the same voice channel as mine.
musicDecorator.useRequestChannel: Please use the request channel {channel} for music commands.
musicDecorator.useRequestChannelDirect: This command is disabled in the request channel. Please use the player buttons or type the song title/link directly.
musicDecorator.validVCJoinable: Sorry, but I can't **`Connect`** to your voice channel, make sure I have the proper permissions.
musicDecorator.validVCPermission: Sorry, but I can't **`Speak`** in this voice channel; make sure I have the proper permissions.
